itemInfo.itemDesc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and Ash Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Ash Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Ash Timber. It requires Chopping: Beginner knowledge.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Plywood Hardener
item.desc: A material used to strengthen Plywood through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained using Alchemy.

item.name: Ferry Prow
item.desc:
A prow that can be attached to a Ferry, allowing it to sail faster.
When 3 or more set items are installed:
Movement Speed +2%

- Can be Installed on: Ferry

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Ferry Cargo Container
item.desc:
A freight chest that can be attached to a Ferry, allowing it to hold heavier cargo.
When 3 or more set items are installed:
Movement Speed +2%

- Can be Installed on: Ferry

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Trina Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble Trina cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
This model has average durability and faster loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 5 different states.
Base Damage: 750
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Velian Handcrafted Bed
item.desc: A handcrafted bed from Velia.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Velian Handcrafted Sofa
item.desc: A handcrafted sofa from Velia.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200
